content: after i posted this as a project several people asked for a pattern write up as this is my first attempt at writing a pattern i apologize in advance for any mistakes 3/25/09 - i ve made some videos to make the stitches more clear i hope you can see the videos in my photobucket album http //s7 photobucket com/albums/y275/magdiego/smock%20stitch%20videos/
